value.title: Choose the best Azure serverless technology for your compute scenario
value.excerpt: Examine Azure's serverless technologies and choose the right service for your scenario.

value.title: Monitor and troubleshoot your end-to-end Azure network infrastructure by using network monitoring tools
value.excerpt: Learn how to investigate and diagnose problems in your Azure virtual networks by using Network Watcher and other tools.

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway
value.excerpt: Learn about the virtual private network (VPN) gateway options in Azure and typical scenarios for using a VPN. Create and test VPNs to securely connect sites to Azure.

value.title: Manage and control traffic flow in your Azure deployment with routes
value.excerpt: Learn how to control Azure virtual network traffic by implementing custom routes.

value.title: Create an Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Discover ways to use an Azure Storage account to manage your data for billing, access, and storage location of your blobs, files, queues, and tables.

value.title: How to start and stop clusters with Azure Kubernetes Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to start and stop clusters with Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft

value.title: AZ-104: Manage identities and governance in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage identities and governance in Azure and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Manage identities and governance for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage identities and governance in Azure.

topItems.title: Create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory.

topItems.title: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory
topItems.excerpt: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory

topItems.title: Allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset.

topItems.title: Manage access to an Azure subscription by using Azure role-based access control (RBAC)
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to assign management access to a subscription by using Azure role-based access control.

value.title: Connect to virtual machines through the Azure portal by using Azure Bastion
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy Azure Bastion to securely connect to Azure Virtual Machines directly within the Azure portal.

value.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
value.excerpt: Learn how to host your domain on Azure DNS.

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure compute options
value.excerpt: Explore essential Azure concepts to find out how virtual machines, containers, and apps combined with serverless computing services can fortify your business.

value.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Load balance your web service traffic with Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Improve application resilience by distributing load across multiple servers and use path-based routing to direct web traffic.

value.title: Choose the right disk storage for your virtual machine workload
value.excerpt: Azure provides a variety of disk storage options for virtual machine workloads. Identify the features of capabilities of each type to ensure your application performs optimally.

value.title: Design your migration to Azure
value.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Migrate and Azure Database Migration Service.

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure data storage options
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll explore the benefits of Azure data storage services versus on-premises storage.

value.title: Apply and monitor infrastructure standards with Azure Policy
value.excerpt: Learn about tools Azure provides for policy and standards management that support your teams' ownership and development of their resources in the cloud.

value.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

value.title: Architect infrastructure operations in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor, analyze, and manage the ongoing operation of your infrastructure in Azure.

topItems.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

topItems.title: Build a cloud governance strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to access policies, resource locks, and tags, as well as how Azure services such as Azure Policy and Azure Blueprints can help you build a comprehensive cloud governance strategy.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

value.title: Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure
value.excerpt: Discuss the basic concepts for protecting your infrastructure and data when you work in the cloud. Understand what responsibilities are yours and what Azure takes care of for you.

value.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity governance and how you can safeguard access to your organization’s data.

value.title: Embrace Zero Trust with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about the Zero Trust model and how to implement Zero Trust into your organization.

value.title: Provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location
value.excerpt: Learn how to provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location.

value.title: Administer infrastructure resources in Azure
value.excerpt: This learning path teaches how to create and customize Windows and Linux virtual machines, connect them to virtual networks, and keep them updated.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

topItems.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

topItems.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

topItems.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: Create serverless applications
value.excerpt: In this learning path, discover Azure Functions that create event-driven, compute-on-demand systems using server-side logic to build serverless architectures.

topItems.title: Choose the best Azure service to automate your business processes
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll discuss how to choose the appropriate Azure service to integrate and automate business processes.

topItems.title: Create serverless logic with Azure Functions
topItems.excerpt: Azure Functions allow you to host business logic that can be executed without managing or provisioning server infrastructure

topItems.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
topItems.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.

topItems.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll learn how to integrate your Azure Function with various data sources by using bindings.

value.title: Deploy a website with Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn to use a Windows or Linux Azure Virtual Machine to extend the website support that Azure provides.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

topItems.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

topItems.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

topItems.title: Build and run a web application with the MEAN stack on an Azure Linux virtual machine
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to decide if the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, and Node.js) is a good choice for you and set up a MEAN-based web application on a new Azure Linux virtual machine.

value.title: Improve application scalability and resiliency by using Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to use Azure Load Balancer to distribute traffic between multiple virtual servers or services.

value.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: Learn how to troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer.

value.title: Implement an Authentication and Access Management solution
value.excerpt: Implement an Authentication and Access Management solution

topItems.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use multi-factor authentication with Azure AD to harden your user accounts.

topItems.title: Manage user authentication
topItems.excerpt: Manage user authentication

topItems.title: Plan, implement, and administer conditional access
topItems.excerpt: Plan, implement, and administer conditional access
